sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
#app.app
  .youtube-app-container
    youtube-configurator(:placeholder="placeholder"
                         :label="label"
                         @onSubmit="onSubmit"
                         @toggle-switch="onToggleSwitch")
    youtube-video(:videoId="videoId"
      :autoPause="autoPause")
</template>

<script>
import YoutubeVideo from './components/YouttubeVideo.vue'
import YoutubeConfigurator from './components/YoutubeConfigurator.vue'
import { videoIdParser } from './utility/parser'
import { validateVideoId } from './utility/validator/youtube-video-validation'
import { YOUTUBE_API_CODES } from './constants/constants'
export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    YoutubeVideo,
    YoutubeConfigurator
  },
  data() {
    return {
      videoId: 'MpGsiRy8jUk',
      autoPause: false,
      label: 'Enter a URL or video ID',
      placeholder: 'ex: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_83LZ79VMLg&ab_channel=MrMoMMusic'
    }
  },
  methods: {
    onSubmit(input) {
      const videoId = videoIdParser(input)

      validateVideoId(videoId).then((status) => {
        if (status === YOUTUBE_API_CODES.VALID) {
          this.hornyBasket = videoId
        }
      })
    },
    onToggleSwitch(switchValue) {
      this.autoPause = switchValue
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
@import 'src/styles/flex';

.youtube-app-container {
  @include flex-column();
}
</style>


<style lang="scss">

</style>
